title: Microenvironment Engineering of Covalent Organic Frameworks based Single/Dual-Atom Catalysts toward Sustainable Energy Conversion and Storage
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03704A, Review Article
Ligang Wang, Jialu Li, Shufang Ji, Yuli Xiong, Dingsheng Wang
Atomically dispersed catalysts with nearly 100% metal utilization have attracted widespread interest in heterogeneous catalysis, energy storage and conversion. Considering the strong metal-support interactions (SMSI), the support plays a vital...
